Reviews.Title: Great for price, cant beat it!
Reviews.Author: Austin Block "Austin Block"
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure whats with the lack of reviews but this camera is great. It is name brand, always good, and comes with everything you need. 60ft of CCTV cabling, 1 power adapter, camera and mount, and instructions. It is the video quality I expected at 480TVL. Mine is mounted outside a window facing my front door. Its a good 100ft and you can clearly see arriving people and the night vision reached , although barely. I am surprised because it said only up to a certain range works best. It is full metal and is very tough. You can adjust it in every direction and the top cover also slides around you you can turn the lens. The night vision LEDs are undetectable which is a great feature.PROS ~- cant beat the price- all metal- includes wiring- reasonable video quality- undetectable night visionCONS ~- no audio- not HD (not like its supposed to be)I WOULD highly recommend this product to all others, friends, and family.

Reviews.Title: Price vs quality
Reviews.Author: Heath B.
Reviews.Content: Impressed for the application. Remember you are not paying $200 for this productGood clear camera for the money. Nothing els out there for the price, you will love it.

Reviews.Title: Good quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Neal Quiros "sweetwater fox"
Reviews.Content: I bought camera to replace another Lorex camera on my system whose image quality had detiorated (lost all color, even in daylight) after only one year of use.  This camera works as advertised but I would of liked to have seen a slightly better image quality.  Cable run to DVR is only 25 feet and I replaced cables and changed channels signal was coming in on, but still didn't get crisp image I was hoping for.  For the price I say the camera is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Serves the purpose well enough
Reviews.Author: Echosyn
Reviews.Content: Worth the money I paid. Night vision clarity is sharper than I expected. Day sharpness at 480 TVL is not as sharp as my other cameras at 420 TVL. Color accuracy is a bit off and hard to correct but I can live with that. Transition from day to night modes is very good. I mounted this in a metal box for weather protection and the slide hood serves well to keep the sun off the lens. The provided 100' cable attenuated the signal a bit so I replaced it with a RG59 that was on hand and that improved the image.

Reviews.Title: These cameras do everything they promised.
Reviews.Author: Stacy Byce
Reviews.Content: This was an easy set up.  The night vision could be a little bit better, but it does everything it promised.  These are nice cameras.

Reviews.Title: Washout
Reviews.Author: Scott Howard
Reviews.Content: Wash out in high light conditions,loses color. Weak infrared night performance, shorter infrared light range than expected. a a a a

Reviews.Title: Lorex security camera
Reviews.Author: J. M. Jones
Reviews.Content: Good middle of the road camera. Daytime function is good and nighttime function is satisfactory but not great. Would still buy again for my application.

ProductInfo.Features:
480 TV lines of resolution
4.6mm F2.0 fixed lens
57 degree field of view
30 invisible IR's
IP66 weatherproof rated
ProductInfo.Name: Lorex CVC6945 Vantage Indoor/Outdoor Color Security Camera (Black)
